name: NoMoveNoDie
description:
Like or don't like, please rate us on Ludum Dare : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/no-move-no-die

CONTROL:  ARROW Keys to move your hero, and SPACE to pass the move.

This is a LD40 project under theme "the more you have, the worse it is".

What we try to represent to you: the more you have moved, the worse it is. 

However, this may not always the case.

Hope you like the idea.

Short Guide:

Survive Guide:
1. Move: Arrow key
2. Stay: Space 
3. Opponent can only be killed when its level is not greater than the attacker.
3. Every move you do that doesn't kill cause enemy to level up
4. You will level up when kill an enemy
5. The more you moved, the more powerful enemy you will face.
